        Parameters:

        relativePath - file from which the blob will be created, relative to the repository's working dir
        Returns:

      • createdFromDisk

                                  String path)
        Read a file from the filesystem and write its content to the Object Database as a loose blob
        Parameters:
        repo - repository where the blob will be written. this repository can be bare or not
        path - file from which the blob will be created
        Returns:
        the id of the written blob
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

      • createFromStream

        public static WriteStream createFromStream(Repository repo,
                                           String hintpath)
        Create a stream to write a new blob into the object db

        This function may need to buffer the data on disk and will in general not be the right choice if you know the size of the data to write. If you have data in memory, use `git_blob_create_frombuffer()`. If you do not, but know the size of the contents (and don't want/need to perform filtering), use `git_odb_open_wstream()`.

        Don't close this stream yourself but pass it to `git_blob_create_fromstream_commit()` to commit the write to the object db and get the object id.

        If the `hintpath` parameter is filled, it will be used to determine what git filters should be applied to the object before it is written to the object database.

        Parameters:
        repo - Repository where the blob will be written. This repository can be bare or not.
        hintpath - If not NULL, will be used to select data filters to apply onto the content of the blob to be created.
        Returns:
        WriteStream an object to write data to.
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

      • createFromStreamCommit

        public static Oid createFromStreamCommit(WriteStream ws)
        Close the stream and write the blob to the object db

        The stream will be closed and freed.

        Parameters:
        ws - an object to write data to.
        Returns:
        id of the new blob
        Throws:
        GitException - git error

        public static Oid createFromBuffer(Repository repo,

        Write an in-memory buffer to the ODB as a blob
        Parameters:

        buf - data to be written into the blob
        Returns:

        public static Blob lookupPrefix(Repository repo,
                                Oid oid)
        Lookup a blob from short sha in a repository. You probably want to use Blob::lookup instead.
        Parameters:
        repo - git repo
        oid - sha of the blob to search.
        Returns:
        found blob or null
        Throws:
